victim.name: Dr. Evelyn Harwick
victim.murder_method: Lethal injection of experimental memory-affecting drug
victim.location: Harwick Memory Research Institute - her private office

client.name: Malcolm Rivers
client.occupation: Retired professor, current memory study participant
client.charges: First-degree murder of Dr. Evelyn Harwick
why_appears_guilty: Found unconscious in victim's office with murder weapon nearby
Suffers from early-stage dementia - claims no memory of events
Had public argument with victim about experimental treatment
Fingerprints on syringe used to inject lethal drug
Security footage shows him entering building at time of murder
History of aggressive episodes during cognitive decline
why_actually_innocent: Memory blackouts make him vulnerable to manipulation
Real killer exploited his dementia to create false memories
Syringe was placed in his hand while unconscious
Research notes show victim was helping, not harming him
Someone with medical knowledge orchestrated the frame-up

real_killer.name: Dr. Harrison Cole
real_killer.true_motive: Victim discovered his falsified research data that secured millions in funding
why_not_suspected: Was supposedly in surgery during time of murder
Appears to be advocating for client's mental health needs
Hospital records seem to confirm his alibi

victory_conditions.prove_client_innocent: Demonstrate Malcolm was unconscious and manipulated
victory_conditions.expose_real_killer: Reveal Dr. Cole's research fraud and alibi fabrication
victory_conditions.explain_memory_manipulation: Show how Malcolm's dementia was exploited to create false memories
